name: A Cave in the Wild
sceneback: As time was a luxury you decided to travel across land rather than use the King's Highway.  On the third day out you foud a trail of large footprints heading up in to the hills.  Curiosity got the better of you and followed the ttracks over the hills and into a small valley below.  The trail ends at the entrance to a dark cave.  You tentatively step inside.
missgoal:
Players are required to defeat the master Ogre in Area 2.
Players start with 3 Conquest Tokens.

rooms.initial_text: As you open the door you hear growling and the shuffle of feet.  Your torches illuminate a natural cavern to reveal what appears to be crude living quarters.  Piles of junk lie strewn about the room.  The smell of wet dog and burnt hair assails your nostrils.
rooms.encounter_text: You rummage through a particularly large and smelly pile of rubbish.  Amist the rotting food and decay you discover a Healing Potion.

rooms.initial_text: You unlock the door and pull it open to reveal an even more pungent stench.  Bones lie scattered here and there in this large natrual cavern. A large Ogre loks up from its current meal (A half devoured sheep) and glares at you with intent.
